explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

pyrophoric_liquids.rationale: May burn but does not ignite readily.(HSDB(2006)) Even if it contacts air, it does not ignite (Bayer crop science corporations based on experience).

self_heating_substances.rationale: Test methods applicable to liquid substances are not available

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: It does not become spontaneous combustibility even if it contacts water. Moreover, flammable and combustible gases are not produced (Bayer crop science corporations based on experience).

organic_peroxides.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with peroxide present in the molecule.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: SPECIES: Rat ENDPOINT: LD50 VALUE: 320 mg/kg, 509 mg/kg REFERENCE SOURCE: Agricultural Chemical Registration Data

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: It was classified into Category 4 based on rat LD50 = 2000 and 2000mg/kg (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: It was classified into category 3 based on the lower value among rat LC50 = 1.2 and 0.8mg/L (Agricultural-Chemicalsd abstracts).

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Since "there was almost no irritation (Draze score 0.4)"in test on rabbits (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it was classified as out of Category.

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: It was classified out of Category based on the result of "no stimulativeness"in rabbit test (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts).

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: Classified as out of category on the basis that no sensitization was found by the Maximization method using guinea pigs (agrochemical abstract).

carcinogenicity.rationale: There are negative results from the in vivo multi-generation mutagenicity test using germ cells (dominant lethal test in mice) and the in vivo mutagenicity test using somatic cells (the chromosome aberration test using mouse bone-marrow cells, the mouse micronucleus test) (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts). And there is no test with a positive result, the substance was regarded as outside the categories.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: Based on being classified into A4 according to ACGIH (ACGIH (1996)), it was classified as out of Category. In addition, there was no finding which indicates carcinogenicity also in the carcinogenic examination of mice (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts).

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_statement: Suspected of damaging fertility or the unborn child
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: Since there was increase of late resorptied embryo in the dose affecting to parent animals in pregnant period administration to rabbit, and there were decrease of conception rate, birth rate, survival rate, and nursing rate and the decrease of the average of the number of implantation and the average of the number of litters, and the increase of the number of the death, in the dose affecting to parent animals in the two-generation test of rat (Agricultural-Chemicals abstracts), it is classified into the Category 2.

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: The substance was classified as Category 1 (nervous system). Because effects on the nervous system (effects resulting from cholinesterase inhibition, blurred vision, staggering, not responding to stimuli and dyspnea) were observed (ACGIH (2001), JMPR (1980)). Cholinergic effects and effects on the nervous system, such as tremors, convulsions, decrease in locomotor activity, and salivation, have also been observed in tests using rats (Agricultural-Chemical abstracts, JMPR (1997)).

aspiration_hazard.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure
aspiration_hazard.hazard_statement: Cause damage to organs through prolonged or repeated exposure (nervous system)
aspiration_hazard.rationale: The cholinesterase inhibition and cholinergic symptoms (tremor, convulsion, etc.) in the repeated oral administration for three months using rat were observed, and because the dose are within the range of the guidance value of Category 1 (Agricultural Chemicals abstracts) they are classified into Category 1 (nervous system) .

acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 1 from 48-hour EC50=0.00087mg/L of Crustacea (Daphnia magna) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 2004).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_statement: Very toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Classified into Category 1, since acute toxicity is Category 1, supposed not rapidly degrading (BIOWIN), and bioaccumulative (log Kow=4.09 (PHYSPROP Database, 2005)).
